name: Your Welcome to Quizzical6 | Mixed 15 Questions | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which fictitious character lives in the Hundred Acre Wood?
How long did the Hundred Years' War last between England and France?
Which is NOT a member of Top Cat's Manhattan Alley Cats as seen on children's television?
Which is NOT a suit in a pack of tarot cards?
questions.explanation:
Shields.

	The fourth suit is pentacles

questions.text: From which language do we get the words: Assassin, Magazine and Sofa?
Whose real name is Eleanora Fagan?
Which sign of the zodiac is NOT a 'fire' sign?
questions.explanation:
Scorpio.

	Earth signs are Taurus, Capricorn and Virgo. Air signs are Gemini, Libra and Aquarius. Water signs are Scorpio, Cancer and Pisces.

questions.text: Who said,'How inappropriate to call this planet Earth, when it is clearly ocean'?
Which group of islands' official Spanish name is Archipielago de Colon whose capital is San Cristobal?
Which animal is NOT in the Chinese calendar?
questions.explanation:
Deer.

	The twelve are: Rooster, Dog, Dragon, Horse, Monkey, Ox, Boar, Rat, Rabbit, Sheep, Snake and Tiger.

questions.text: Which best selling novelist has the real name of Howard Allen O'Brien?
questions.explanation:
Anne Rice.

	Christened Howard Allen O'Brien after her father, she made sure of being called Anne from her school days.

questions.text: St. Boniface is the Patron Saint of which country?
Nelophobia is a morbid, irrational fear of or aversion to which material?
